name: Blipsocial
tag_list: blackberry, iphone, gsm, gps, location, lbs, local-search, social-network, gas, mileage, auto, weather, traffic, micro-blog, blog
overview:
Blipsocial is your location aware mobile portal. It brings location relevant content to your mobile experience, with or without the need for GPS. This downloaded application also includes a launchpad for a variety of mobile services.

Blipsocial has launched their public beta on Blackberry devices world-wide and will soon launch an iPhone application. A developer API is also available for other parties who want to localize some of their information or web applications without having to go through the trouble of building a local java app from the ground up. If appropriate, they may also place their apps on the Blipsocial launchpad.

Current applications include:

  • Facebook-powered buddy finder - check out all of your friends’ status and locations (if shared). Blipsocial facebook application must also be added for this functionality.
  • Yelp-powered local search based on your current location.
  • Local Notes: a geo tagged twitter which lets you post and see comments of those around you.
  • BART realtime train tracking - find the next train at the nearest station. Caltrain is coming soon.
  • Gas Tracker - track your gas mileage per vehicle, share and compare with similar vehicles, and find cheaper gas
  • Local weather forecast
  • Nearby movie theaters and showtimes
  • Realtime nearby traffic conditions

More applications are being added all the time!
